memberdef.type: std::map< uint8_t, std::function< void(uint8_t, bool, uint16_t)> >
memberdef.name: change_callbacks

briefdescription.para: Create a new Digital Output Card object with the specified address.

simplesect.para: If you are using the ESPMegaI/O board, you should use the dip switch constructor

parameterdescription.para: The ESPMegaI/O address of the card

memberdef.argsstring: (bool bit0, bool bit1, bool bit2, bool bit3, bool bit4)
memberdef.name: DigitalOutputCard

briefdescription.para: Create a new Digital Output Card object with the specified position on the dip switch.

simplesect.para: The bit 0 are at the left of the dip switch
There are 5 switches on the dip switch, they should be unique accross all the cards

parameterdescription.para: The position of the first switch on the dip switch
The position of the second switch on the dip switch
The position of the third switch on the dip switch
The position of the fourth switch on the dip switch
The position of the fifth switch on the dip switch

briefdescription.para: Initialize the Digital Output Card.

simplesect.para: Although this function can be called inside the main program, it is recommended to use ESPMegaPRO::installCard() instead
True if the initialization is successful, false otherwise

briefdescription.para: The main loop for the Digital Output Card object.

simplesect.para: This function is not used, it is only here to implement the ExpansionCard interface

briefdescription.para: Write a digtal LOW or HIGH to the specified pin.

simplesect.para: This function set both the state and the pwm value of the pin

parameterdescription.para: The pin to set the state
The logic level to set the pin to

briefdescription.para: Write a pwm value to the specified pin.

simplesect.para: This function set both the state and the pwm value of the pin

parameterdescription.para: The pin to set the pwm value
The pwm value to set

briefdescription.para: Set the state of the specified pin.

parameterdescription.para: The pin to set the state
The state of the pin

briefdescription.para: Set the pwm value of the specified pin.

parameterdescription.para: The pin to set the pwm value
The pwm value to set

briefdescription.para: Get the state of the specified pin.

parameterdescription.para: The pin to get the state

briefdescription.para: Get the pwm value of the specified pin.

parameterdescription.para: The pin to get the pwm value

simplesect.para: The pwm value of the pin

briefdescription.para: Register a callback function for the specified pin.

parameterdescription.para: The callback function to be called, the first parameter is the pin, the second parameter is the state, the third parameter is the pwm value

simplesect.para: The handler of the callback function

briefdescription.para: Unregister a callback function.

parameterdescription.para: The handler of the callback function to be unregistered

briefdescription.para: Load a pin map.

detaileddescription.para: A pin map is an array of 16 elements that maps the physical pins to virtual pins The virtual pins are the pins that are used in the callback functions and are used for all the functions in this class The physical pins are the pins on the Output IC, This can be found on the schematic of the ESPMegaI/O board This function is useful if you want to change the number identification of the pins to match your project needs

parameterdescription.para: The pin map to load

briefdescription.para: Bind a FRAM to the card.

simplesect.para: The Output Card use 34 bytes of FRAM
If the fram range overlap with another card, undefined behavior will occur

parameterdescription.para: The FRAM to bind
The address of the card in the FRAM

briefdescription.para: Save the states and values of all the pins to the FRAM.
Load the states and values of all the pins from the FRAM.
Set the auto save to FRAM.

parameterdescription.para: True to enable auto save, false to disable auto save

briefdescription.para: Save a single pin value to FRAM.

parameterdescription.para: The pin to save

briefdescription.para: Save the states of all the pins to FRAM.
Get the type of the card.
Pack the states of all the pins into a 16 bit integer.
Unpack the states of all the pins from a 16 bit integer.

parameterdescription.para: The packed states

briefdescription.para: The DigitalOutputCard class is a class for controlling the Digital Output Card.

detaileddescription.para: This Digital Output Card has 16 digital outputs. All outputs are PWM capable. ALl outputs are 12V Push-Pull outputs. Outputs is grouped in 4 groups of 4 outputs.(0-3, 4-7, 8-11, 12-15) Each pin is capable of 0.6A, however each group's total current is limited to 1.2A.

simplesect.para: You should not instantiate this class directly, instead use ESPMegaIO's registerCard function.
